summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3221 for the improvement of West 65th Street, from 32nd Avenue Northwest to 7th Avenue Northwest; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 39904, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
